sentences.english: It would be worse than beating an anvil with a sledge hammer.
sentences.chinese: 那還不如用大鐵錘打鐵砧。

sentences.english: It was less a hill than a gigantic anvil jumping out of the mountain range.
sentences.chinese: 那座他指着的山更象是一個從山脈裏蹦出來的鐵砧。

sentences.english: Pitted anvil surfaces may be refinished with 600 grit paper .
sentences.chinese: 鐵砧表面的凹痕可能要用600沙礫紙打磨。

sentences.english: I know that the irony strikes with the force of a cartoon anvil, now.
sentences.chinese: 我現在知道那就象用一個卡通鐵砧當作鐵器用力敲打。

sentences.english: An iron anvil should have a hammer of feathers.
sentences.chinese: 鐵砧要用羽錘敲，犟人要用軟法治。

sentences.english: This was compared with a block of iron squeezed on an anvil.
sentences.chinese: 這可與在鐵砧上擠壓出來的鐵塊相比較。

sentences.english: Combat is the anvil of will!
The blacksmith shaped a horseshoe on his anvil.
sentences.chinese: 鐵匠在鐵砧上打成了一個馬蹄鐵。
